question: Ustad Ghulam Mustafa Khan, who passed away recently, was associated with which field?
explanation:
Veteran Indian classical musician Ustad Ghulam Mustafa Khan has recently passed away at the age of 89, at Mumbai.
The legendary musician was awarded the Padma Shri in 1991, followed by Padma Bhushan in 2006 and Padma Vibhushan in 2018. He was also honoured with the Sangeet Natak Akademi award in the year 2003.
